data.oai_dc:dc: McDermott and DeGroote raw data PLOS ONE

Data were collected at a bird banding station in Pennsylvania and are summarized by year. Species codes are standard four letter abbreviations (http://www.birdpop.org/docs/misc/Alpha_codes_eng.pdf). Variables beginning with X are temperature means in three week intervals (see manuscript text). The following 3 numbers correspond to the month and day at the beginning of the interval. The other column headings are explained in the Methods section.
